name: Lymphofight
description:
Welcome to Lymphofight As a white blood cell it's your job to defend the body from infection and disease. Fight through an increasing number of pathogens to defeat the boss. Collect items after each level to increase your destructive power. After defeating the boss at the end of the final level, you will be sent back to the start with all your items, but the difficulty will only get higher. Controls:
WASD to move
Space to shoot
Shift to fire laser item
Escape to pause

Programming by Anotic
Artwork by MonsiuerLeFrog
Music from the FreeMusicArchive:

  • Title Screen Song
  • Gameplay Song
